first.title: Select an address
first.description: Input any wallet address that you want to copy trade or select one from the leaderboard

second.title: Add your filters
second.description: Create your criteria for what type of transactions triggers a copy trade

third.title: Set your allowance
third.description: Allocate a percent of your funds to your copy trading position

fourth.title: View your positions
fourth.description: View your trades when they get executed and track your PnL

create.address: Copy/paste the address you want to echo.....
create.amount: Type in the amount you want to invest...
